message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its quality and features.

I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I'm not willing to go all the way up to $180. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $180 is already a competitive price for this product. How about we meet halfway and settle at $160?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $145, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $145?
